Description.Text: Hotel Vermont is designed to serve the needs of both the leisure and business traveler by creating a unique and authentic "Vermont" experience: stimulating spaces that blend comfort and productivity while exuding casual warmth.Local and global, natural and sophisticated, hand wrought and high tech. We give you space to yourself and room to gather. And we're here to help you explore like a local, relax like it's your job and soak in every detail.
